page.title: 04INDUSTRIAL EST.WASHINGTON
page.content: { }The {Stephenson Estate}was built on wasteland by the{Development {Corporation}to improve industry. It consists of several factories and warehouses. We conducted a survey of two factories and a warehouse: {Bainbridge Silencers}is a factory which distributes car exhaust systems. It provides employment for 13 people, mostly truck delivery men. The reason for the small staff is the use of {computers}which enable fast ordering by companies who pay by account. The{Philips}factory makes a deflection unit for coloured televisions. It is one of several factories throughout England,but the parent company is Dutch. The factory employs 598 workers who work shifts. The {Nike} sportsware warehouse and distribution centre is the only one in England although there are factories abroad.
